meanings.definition: A structure of planks or plates for protection or defense.
meanings.sent1: The plutei shielded the soldiers from enemy arrows.
meanings.sent2: The castle had tall plutei surrounding its walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the plutei as a hiding spot from the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a plutei against the harsh words thrown at her.
meanings.sent5: The plutei stood strong against the raging storm, keeping everyone safe inside.

meanings.definition: A screen or partition of planks or plates.
meanings.sent1: The plutei separated the kitchen from the dining area.
meanings.sent2: The office cubicles were made of plutei for privacy.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the plutei were secret doors to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: The plutei in the garden created a sense of mystery and intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The plutei in the library helped to reduce noise and distractions for studying.
